original_text: And it came to pass, that on one of those days, as he taught the people in the temple, and preached the gospel, the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders,
korean_text: 하루는 예수께서 성전에서 백성을 가르치시며 복음을 전하실새 대제사장들과 서기관들이 장로들과 함께 가까이 와서

sentences.original_text: that on one of those days
as he taught the people in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성전에서 백성을 가르치고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the chief priests and the scribes
came upon him with the elders
